alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:23PM CDT until June 14 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Central Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... Central Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 622 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Altheimer, or 9 miles northeast of Pine Bluff, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Altheimer... Gould... Gillett... Humphrey... Grady... Almyra... Cottondale... Whitefield... Linwood... Little Bayou Meto Park... Madding... Warbritton... Woodville... Langford... Douglas... Richardson... De Witt... Wabbaseka... Sherrill... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
